features.name: CheckingStatus
features.description: Balance in checking account (in DM - Deutsche Marks)

features.name: LoanDuration
features.description: Duration of loan in months

features.name: CreditHistory
features.description: Applicant's past credit repayment behavior

features.name: LoanPurpose
features.description: Reason for taking the loan

features.name: LoanAmount
features.description: Amount of loan requested

features.name: ExistingSavings
features.description: Balance in savings account (in DM)

features.name: EmploymentDuration
features.description: How long applicant has been employed (in years)

features.name: InstallmentPercent
features.description: Installment rate as percentage of disposable income

features.name: Sex
features.description: Gender of the applicant

features.name: OthersOnLoan
features.description: Whether there are co-applicants or guarantors on the loan

features.name: CurrentResidenceDuration
features.description: How long applicant has lived at current residence (in years)

features.name: OwnsProperty
features.description: Type of property or assets owned by applicant

features.name: Age
features.description: Age of the applicant in years

features.name: InstallmentPlans
features.description: Whether applicant has other installment plans (stores, bank, none)

features.name: Housing
features.description: Type of housing the applicant lives in (own, rent, free)

features.name: ExistingCreditsCount
features.description: Number of existing credits the applicant has at this bank

features.name: Job
features.description: Employment skill level of the applicant

features.name: Dependents
features.description: Number of people financially dependent on the applicant

features.name: Telephone
features.description: Whether applicant has a registered telephone number

features.name: ForeignWorker
features.description: Whether the applicant is a foreign worker

features.name: Risk
